description:
A series of flashbacks to his younger days - and some painful persuasion by Robin - help Franky make the difficult decision to leave his friends and go to sea with the Straw Hats!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu mes chers compagnons ! Le départ de Franky !
Goodbye, My Dear Underlings! Franky Departs
さらば愛しき子分達! フランキー発つ
